main event: A UFO sighting was reported involving a round white object with a bright light and no sound over Brooklyn, New York on May 20, 1955.
interesting points: The sighting occurred at dusk,The object was described as round with a bright light,There were no photographs associated with the report,The length of observation and the number of objects were both unknown,Comments suggested it might be an aircraft landing or a navigational light.
sighted object: round white object with bright light
